Player History
Drafted in 13th round, 200th overall pick, by St. Louis (B) in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2015, off Henry Lee (CHI)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/9/2015, off John Suits (BOS)...
1/31/2016: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,785,714 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 3/27/2016 with a Fractured Jaw, out for 4 weeks...
Injured on 5/5/2016 with a Broken Hand, out for 8 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/4/2016, hitting .538 with 3 HR, 11 RBI...
Won World Series with St. Louis (B) in 2016...
1/31/2017: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,625,714 through salary arbitration...
Hit 3 homeruns against Brooklyn, driving in 6 runs on 4/23/2017...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/24/2017, hitting .522 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
Had 23-game hitting streak snapped on 6/14/2017...
Was selected to the 2017 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 2/8/2018 to a 5-year deal worth $9,500,000 per year...
Drove in 7 runs against Kansas City on 9/10/2018...
Was selected to the 2021 Allstar game...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/2021, hitting .395 with 4 HR, 17 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Cincinnati on 6/12/2022...
Was selected to the 2022 Allstar game...
Injured on 8/7/2022 with a Strained Anterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 5 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by San Francisco on 2/3/2023 to a 3-year deal worth $8,000,000 per year...
